title: FormGroup
contents:
API > @angular/forms
mode_edit code

FormGrouplink

追蹤一組 FormControl 例項的值和有效狀態。

Tracks the value and validity state of a group of FormControl instances.

檢視"說明"...

class FormGroup<TControl extends { [K in keyof TControl]: AbstractControl<any>; } = any> extends AbstractControl<ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, ɵFormGroupValue<TControl>, any>, ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, ɵFormGroupRawValue<TControl>, any>> { constructor(controls: TControl, validatorOrOpts?: ValidatorFn | AbstractControlOptions | ValidatorFn[], asyncValidator?: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]) controls: ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, TControl, {...} registerControl<K extends string & keyof TControl>(name: K, control: TControl[K]): TControl[K] addControl<K extends string & keyof TControl>(name: K, control: Required<TControl>[K], options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void removeControl(name: string, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void setControl<K extends string & keyof TControl>(name: K, control: TControl[K], options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void contains<K extends string & keyof TControl>(controlName: K): boolean setValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, { [K in keyof TControl]: ɵRawValue<TControl[K]>; }>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void patchValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, Partial<{ [K in keyof TControl]: ɵValue<TControl[K]>; }>>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void reset(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any, ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, Partial<{ [K in keyof TControl]: ɵValue<TControl[K]>; }>>> = {} as unknown as ɵFormGroupValue<TControl>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void getRawValue(): ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, ɵFormGroupRawValue<TControl>, any> // 繼承自 forms/AbstractControl constructor(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[], asyncValidators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]) value: TValue validator: ValidatorFn | null asyncValidator: AsyncValidatorFn | null parent: FormGroup | FormArray | null status: FormControlStatus valid: boolean invalid: boolean pending: boolean disabled: boolean enabled: boolean errors: ValidationErrors | null pristine: boolean dirty: boolean touched: boolean untouched: boolean valueChanges: Observable<TValue> statusChanges: Observable<FormControlStatus> updateOn: FormHooks root: AbstractControl setValidators(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[]): void setAsyncValidators(validators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]): void addValidators(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[]): void addAsyncValidators(validators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]): void removeValidators(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[]): void removeAsyncValidators(validators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]): void hasValidator(validator: ValidatorFn): boolean hasAsyncValidator(validator: AsyncValidatorFn): boolean clearValidators(): void clearAsyncValidators(): void markAsTouched(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAllAsTouched(): void markAsUntouched(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAsDirty(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAsPristine(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAsPending(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void disable(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void enable(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void setParent(parent: FormGroup<any> | FormArray<any>): void abstract setValue(value: TRawValue, options?: Object): void abstract patchValue(value: TValue, options?: Object): void abstract reset(value?: TValue, options?: Object): void getRawValue(): any updateValueAndValidity(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void setErrors(errors: ValidationErrors, opts: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void get<P extends string | ((string | number)[])>(path: P): AbstractControl<ɵGetProperty<TRawValue, P>> | null getError(errorCode: string, path?: string | (string | number)[]): any hasError(errorCode: string, path?: string | (string | number)[]): boolean }

子類別link

  • FormRecord

說明link

當例項化 FormGroup 時，在第一個引數中傳入一組子控制項。每個子控制項會用控制項名把自己註冊進去。

A FormGroup aggregates the values of each child FormControl into one object, with each control name as the key. It calculates its status by reducing the status values of its children. For example, if one of the controls in a group is invalid, the entire group becomes invalid.

FormGroup 是用於在 Angular 中定義表單的四個基本建構塊之一，與 FormControl、FormArray 和 FormRecord。

FormGroup is one of the four fundamental building blocks used to define forms in Angular, along with FormControl, FormArray, and FormRecord.

例項化 FormGroup 時，請傳入子控制項的集合作為第一個引數。每個子項的鍵都會註冊控制項的名稱。

When instantiating a FormGroup, pass in a collection of child controls as the first argument. The key for each child registers the name for the control.

FormGroup 適用於提前知道金鑰的使用案例。如果你需要動態新增和刪除控制項，請改用 FormRecord。

FormGroup is intended for use cases where the keys are known ahead of time. If you need to dynamically add and remove controls, use FormRecord instead.

FormGroup 接受一個可選的型別引數 TControl，它是一種以內部控制項型別作為值的物件型別。

FormGroup accepts an optional type parameter TControl, which is an object type with inner control types as values.

Further information is available in the Usage Notes...

建構函式link

建立一個新的 FormGroup 例項。

Creates a new FormGroup instance.

This class is "final" and should not be extended. See the public API notes.

constructor(controls: TControl, validatorOrOpts?: ValidatorFn | AbstractControlOptions | ValidatorFn[], asyncValidator?: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[])
引數
controls TControl

子控制項的集合。每個子控制項的鍵就是其註冊名稱。

A collection of child controls. The key for each child is the name under which it is registered.
validatorOrOpts ValidatorFn | AbstractControlOptions | ValidatorFn[]

一個同步驗證器函式或其陣列，或者一個包含驗證函式和驗證觸發器的 AbstractControlOptions 物件。

可選值。預設值為 undefined。

A synchronous validator function, or an array of such functions, or an AbstractControlOptions object that contains validation functions and a validation trigger.
asyncValidator AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]

單個的非同步驗證器函式或其陣列。

可選值。預設值為 undefined。

A single async validator or array of async validator functions

屬性link

屬性 說明
controls: ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, TControl, { [key: string]: AbstractControl<any>; }>

方法link

registerControl()link

mode_edit code

使用組的控制項列表註冊控制項。在強型別組中，控制項必須是組的型別（可能作為可選鍵）。

Registers a control with the group's list of controls. In a strongly-typed group, the control must be in the group's type (possibly as an optional key).

registerControl<K extends string & keyof TControl>(name: K, control: TControl[K]): TControl[K]
引數
name K

註冊到集合中的控制項名

The control name to register in the collection
control TControl[K]

提供這個名字對應的控制項

Provides the control for the given name
返回值

TControl[K]
registerControl(name: string, control: AbstractControl<any, any>): AbstractControl<any>
引數
name string
control AbstractControl<any, any>
返回值

AbstractControl<any>

此方法不更新控制項的值或有效性。使用 addControl 代替。

This method does not update the value or validity of the control. Use addControl instead.

addControl()link

mode_edit code

向此組新增控制項。在強型別組中，控制項必須是組的型別（可能作為可選鍵）。

Add a control to this group. In a strongly-typed group, the control must be in the group's type (possibly as an optional key).

addControl(name: string, control: AbstractControl<any, any>, options?: { emitEvent?: boolean; }): void
引數
name string

要註冊到集合中的控制項名

The control name to add to the collection
control AbstractControl<any, any>

提供這個名字對應的控制項

Provides the control for the given name
options object

指定此 FormGroup 例項是否應在新增新控制項後發出事件。

Specifies whether this FormGroup instance should emit events after a new control is added.

  • emitEvent：當 true 或未提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件在新增控制項時會發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is added. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 undefined。
返回值

void
addControl<K extends string & keyof TControl>(name: K, control: Required<TControl>[K], options?: { emitEvent?: boolean; }): void
引數
name K
control Required<TControl>[K]
options object

可選值。預設值為 undefined。
返回值

void

如果具有給定名稱的控制項已經存在，則不會用新名稱替換它。如果要替換現有控制項，請改用 setControl 方法。此方法還更新控制項的值和有效性。

If a control with a given name already exists, it would not be replaced with a new one. If you want to replace an existing control, use the setControl method instead. This method also updates the value and validity of the control.

removeControl()link

mode_edit code

從此組中刪除控制項。在強型別組中，無法刪除所需的控制項。

Remove a control from this group. In a strongly-typed group, required controls cannot be removed.
removeControl(name: string, options?: { emitEvent?: boolean; }): void
引數
name string
options object

可選值。預設值為 undefined。
返回值

void
removeControl<S extends string>(name: ɵOptionalKeys<TControl> & S, options?: { emitEvent?: boolean; }): void
引數
name ɵOptionalKeys<TControl> & S
options object

可選值。預設值為 undefined。
返回值

void

該方法還會更新本空間的值和有效性。

This method also updates the value and validity of the control.

setControl()link

mode_edit code

替換現有的控制項。在強型別組中，控制項必須是組的型別（可能作為可選鍵）。

Replace an existing control. In a strongly-typed group, the control must be in the group's type (possibly as an optional key).

setControl<K extends string & keyof TControl>(name: K, control: TControl[K], options?: { emitEvent?: boolean; }): void
引數
name K

要從集合中替換掉的控制項名

The control name to replace in the collection
control TControl[K]

提供這個名字對應的控制項

Provides the control for the given name
options object

指定此 FormGroup 例項是否應在替換現有控制項後發出事件。

Specifies whether this FormGroup instance should emit events after an existing control is replaced.

  • emitEvent：當為 true 或不提供（預設）時，當控制項被替換為新控制項時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件都會發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is replaced with a new one. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 undefined。
返回值

void
setControl(name: string, control: AbstractControl<any, any>, options?: { emitEvent?: boolean; }): void
引數
name string
control AbstractControl<any, any>
options object

可選值。預設值為 undefined。
返回值

void

如果此 FormGroup 中不存在具有給定名稱的控制項，則將新增它。

If a control with a given name does not exist in this FormGroup, it will be added.

contains()link

mode_edit code

檢查組內是否有一個具有指定名字的已啟用的控制項。

Check whether there is an enabled control with the given name in the group.

contains<K extends string>(controlName: K): boolean
引數
controlName K

要在集合中檢查是否存在的控制項名

The control name to check for existence in the collection
返回值

對於禁用的控制項為 false，否則為 true。

boolean: false for disabled controls, true otherwise.
contains(controlName: string): boolean
引數
controlName string
返回值

boolean

對禁用的控制項報告 false。如果你只想檢查組中是否存在，請改用 get。

Reports false for disabled controls. If you'd like to check for existence in the group only, use get instead.

setValue()link

mode_edit code

設定此 FormGroup 的值。它接受一個與組結構對應的物件，以控制項名作為 key。

Sets the value of the FormGroup. It accepts an object that matches the structure of the group, with control names as keys.
setValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, { [K in keyof TControl]: ɵRawValue<TControl[K]>; }>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
value ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, { [K in keyof TControl]: ɵRawValue<TControl[K]>; }>

控制項的新值，其結構必須和該組的結構相匹配。

The new value for the control that matches the structure of the group.
options object

確定控制項如何傳播更改並在值更改後發出事件的配置選項。配置選項被傳遞給 updateValueAndValidity 方法。

Configuration options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events after the value changes. The configuration options are passed to the updateValueAndValidity method.

  • onlySelf:：如果為 true，則每個變更僅僅影響當前控制項，而不會影響父控制項。預設為 false。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control, and not its parent. Default is false.

  • emitEvent：如果為 true 或未提供（預設），則當控制項值變化時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 這兩個 Observable 都會以最近的狀態和值發出事件。如果為 false，則不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control value is updated. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

例外

錯誤 When strict checks fail, such as setting the value of a control that doesn't exist or if you exclude a value of a control that does exist.

當嚴格檢查失敗時，例如設定不存在的控制項的值，或者如果你排除存在的控制項的值。

使用說明link

設定表單組的完整值link
Set the complete value for the form grouplink
const form = new FormGroup({ first: new FormControl(), last: new FormControl() }); console.log(form.value); // {first: null, last: null} form.setValue({first: 'Nancy', last: 'Drew'}); console.log(form.value); // {first: 'Nancy', last: 'Drew'}

patchValue()link

mode_edit code

修補此 FormGroup 的值。它接受一個以控制項名為 key 的物件，並儘量把它們的值匹配到組中正確的控制項上。

Patches the value of the FormGroup. It accepts an object with control names as keys, and does its best to match the values to the correct controls in the group.
patchValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, Partial<{ [K in keyof TControl]: ɵValue<TControl[K]>; }>>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
value ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, Partial<{ [K in keyof TControl]: ɵValue<TControl[K]>; }>>

與該組的結構匹配的物件。

The object that matches the structure of the group.
options object

在修補了該值之後，此配置項會決定控制項如何傳播變更以及發出事件。

Configuration options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events after the value is patched.

  • onlySelf：當為 true 時，每次更改都隻影響此控制項，而不影響其父級。預設為 true。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control and not its parent. Default is true.

  • emitEvent：當 true 或未提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件會在更新控制項值時發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。配置選項會傳遞給 updateValueAndValidity 方法。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control value is updated. When false, no events are emitted. The configuration options are passed to the updateValueAndValidity method.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

它能接受組的超集和子集，而不會丟擲錯誤。

It accepts both super-sets and sub-sets of the group without throwing an error.

使用說明link

修補表單組的值link
Patch the value for a form grouplink
const form = new FormGroup({ first: new FormControl(), last: new FormControl() }); console.log(form.value); // {first: null, last: null} form.patchValue({first: 'Nancy'}); console.log(form.value); // {first: 'Nancy', last: null}

reset()link

mode_edit code

重置 FormGroup，將所有後代標記為 pristine 和 untouched，並將所有後代的值設定為預設值，如果沒有提供預設值，則為 null。

Resets the FormGroup, marks all descendants pristine and untouched and sets the value of all descendants to their default values, or null if no defaults were provided.
reset(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any, ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, Partial<{ [K in keyof TControl]: ɵValue<TControl[K]>; }>>> = {} as unknown as ɵFormGroupValue<TControl>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
value ɵIsAny<TControl, any, ɵIsAny<TControl, { [key: string]: any; }, Partial<{ [K in keyof TControl]: ɵValue<TControl[K]>; }>>>

使用初始值或一個包含初始值和禁用狀態的物件來重置該控制項。

可選值。預設值為 {} as unknown as ɵFormGroupValue<TControl>。

Resets the control with an initial value, or an object that defines the initial value and disabled state.
options object

當該組被重置時，此配置項會決定該控制項如何傳播變更以及發出事件。

Configuration options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events when the group is reset.

  • onlySelf:：如果為 true，則每個變更僅僅影響當前控制項，而不會影響父控制項。預設為 false。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control, and not its parent. Default is false.

  • emitEvent：當 true 或未提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件會在控制項重置時發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。配置選項會傳遞給 updateValueAndValidity 方法。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is reset. When false, no events are emitted. The configuration options are passed to the updateValueAndValidity method.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

你可以透過傳入一個與表單結構相匹配的以控制項名為 key 的 Map，來把表單重置為特定的狀態。其狀態可以是一個單獨的值，也可以是一個同時具有值和禁用狀態的表單狀態物件。

You reset to a specific form state by passing in a map of states that matches the structure of your form, with control names as keys. The state is a standalone value or a form state object with both a value and a disabled status.

使用說明link

重置該表單組的值link
Reset the form group valueslink
const form = new FormGroup({ first: new FormControl('first name'), last: new FormControl('last name') }); console.log(form.value); // {first: 'first name', last: 'last name'} form.reset({ first: 'name', last: 'last name' }); console.log(form.value); // {first: 'name', last: 'last name'}
重置該表單組的值以及禁用狀態link
Reset the form group values and disabled statuslink
const form = new FormGroup({ first: new FormControl('first name'), last: new FormControl('last name') }); form.reset({ first: {value: 'name', disabled: true}, last: 'last' }); console.log(form.value); // {last: 'last'} console.log(form.get('first').status); // 'DISABLED'

getRawValue()link

mode_edit code

這個 FormGroup 的聚合值，包括所有已禁用的控制項。

The aggregate value of the FormGroup, including any disabled controls.
getRawValue(): ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, ɵFormGroupRawValue<TControl>, any>
引數

沒有引數。

返回值

ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, ɵFormGroupRawValue<TControl>, any>

無論禁用狀態如何，都檢索所有值。

Retrieves all values regardless of disabled status.

使用說明link

建立一個帶有兩個控制項的表單組link

Create a form group with 2 controlslink

const form = new FormGroup({ first: new FormControl('Nancy', Validators.minLength(2)), last: new FormControl('Drew'), }); console.log(form.value); // {first: 'Nancy', last; 'Drew'} console.log(form.status); // 'VALID'

型別引數和可選控制項link

The type argument, and optional controlslink

FormGroup 接受一個通用引數，該引數是一個包含其內部控制項的物件。這種型別通常會被自動推斷，但如果你願意，你始終可以顯式指定它。

FormGroup accepts one generic argument, which is an object containing its inner controls. This type will usually be inferred automatically, but you can always specify it explicitly if you wish.

如果你有可選的控制項（即它們可以被刪除，你可以在型別中使用 ?）：

If you have controls that are optional (i.e. they can be removed, you can use the ? in the type):

const form = new FormGroup<{ first: FormControl<string|null>, middle?: FormControl<string|null>, // Middle name is optional. last: FormControl<string|null>, }>({ first: new FormControl('Nancy'), last: new FormControl('Drew'), });

建立一個具有組級驗證器的表單組link

Create a form group with a group-level validatorlink

你可以用第二個引數傳入一些組級驗證器或用第三個引數傳入一些組級非同步驗證器。當你要根據一個以上子控制項的值來決定有效性時，這很好用。

You include group-level validators as the second arg, or group-level async validators as the third arg. These come in handy when you want to perform validation that considers the value of more than one child control.

const form = new FormGroup({ password: new FormControl('', Validators.minLength(2)), passwordConfirm: new FormControl('', Validators.minLength(2)), }, passwordMatchValidator); function passwordMatchValidator(g: FormGroup) { return g.get('password').value === g.get('passwordConfirm').value ? null : {'mismatch': true}; }

像 FormControl 例項一樣，你也可以在配置物件中傳入驗證器和非同步驗證器。

Like FormControl instances, you choose to pass in validators and async validators as part of an options object.

const form = new FormGroup({ password: new FormControl('') passwordConfirm: new FormControl('') }, { validators: passwordMatchValidator, asyncValidators: otherValidator });

為表單組中的所有空間設定 updateOn 屬性link

Set the updateOn property for all controls in a form grouplink

該選項物件可用來為每個子控制項的 updateOn 屬性設定預設值。如果在組級把 updateOn 設定為 'blur'，則所有子控制項的預設值也是 'blur'，除非這個子控制項顯式的指定了另一個 updateOn 值。

The options object is used to set a default value for each child control's updateOn property. If you set updateOn to 'blur' at the group level, all child controls default to 'blur', unless the child has explicitly specified a different updateOn value.

const c = new FormGroup({ one: new FormControl() }, { updateOn: 'blur' });

使用帶有可選控制項的 FormGrouplink

Using a FormGroup with optional controlslink

FormGroup 中可以有可選控制項。可選控制項可以在以後使用 removeControl 刪除，並且在呼叫 reset 時可以省略。可選控制項必須在組的型別中宣告為 optional。

It is possible to have optional controls in a FormGroup. An optional control can be removed later using removeControl, and can be omitted when calling reset. Optional controls must be declared optional in the group's type.

const c = new FormGroup<{one?: FormControl<string>}>({ one: new FormControl('') });

請注意，c.value.one 的型別為 string|null|undefined。這是因為在不提供可選鍵 one 的情況下呼叫 c.reset({}) 將導致它變為 null。

Notice that c.value.one has type string|null|undefined. This is because calling c.reset({}) without providing the optional key one will cause it to become null.
